watches.name: SINMA Simple Alloy
description: Wearing this wrist watch is so wonderful experiences, as if you are touching art directly
Perfect for all kind of business, casual, indoor activities or daily use.
This is a good present for your children and relatives and friends who you love
Unique round dial design, very chic and stylish
PRECISE TIME KEEPING: Quartz Movement, provide precise and accurate time keeping

watches.name: Voeons Men's Watch
description: Round watch black dial with featuring hour marks and auto date
Stainless steel watchband and alloy case with safety fold over clasp,no any hurt of your clothes or hands
Quartz movement with analog display with simple black dial,easy to read
Water resistant up to 3 ATM (Suitable for everyday use. Splash/rain resistant.NOT suitable for diving, swimming, snorkeling, water-related work)
Luxury simple design watch,perfect gift with cleaning cloth for men

watches.name: Daimon Men's Watch with Skeleton Face
description: FEATURES: Analog dress watch with casual design; Mesh band; Mineral crystal lens; Stainless Steel Case; Precise Japanese-quartz movement.
DURABLE and COMFORTABLE BAND: stainless steel case makes it super durable, Mesh band provide comfortable wearing experience.
PRECISE TIME KEEPING: Japanese Quartz Movement, provide precise and accurate time keeping.
WATER RESISTANT FOR DAILY USE: 99 FT - (30 M) - 3ATM. Not suitable for swimming and shower.

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: We think you're going to love this watch as much as we do! But in case you don't, you are covered by our 30 day, no questions asked, money back guarantee. We want our customers to be 100% happy.

watches.name: Men's Military Quartz Wrist Watch
description: IDEAL GIFT – One of the newest trends that gives a sophisticated and fashionable look, an ideal gift for your loved ones for any occasions such as Christmas, birthdays, anniversaries, father’s day, graduations, Valentine’s day, etc, or when you simply want to spoil yourself with something new and trendy.

MATERIAL – Made of high quality alloy and metal material with mineral harden glass. Anti- corrosion, anti-scratch, and provides some water proof protection such as from sweat and rain. (Not for swimming, diving, or showering)
TRENDY & CONVENIENT DESIGN – Japanese quartz movement dial. 3 Time-Zone display, convenient for travel and business.
SIZE & DIAL COLOR – Watch Size: Approx. 50 x 55mm; Dial: Gunmetal
Product of Oct17, Trademark Registered.
